verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath a controversy <S%H7379><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, because there is no truth <S%H571><s%>, nor goodness <S%H2617><s%>, nor knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

There is nought but swearing <S%H422><s%> and breaking faith <S%H3584><s%>, and killing <S%H7523><s%>, and stealing <S%H1589><s%>, and committing adultery <S%H5003><s%>; they break out <S%H6555><s%>, and blood <S%H1818><s%> toucheth <S%H5060><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>.

Therefore shall the land <S%H776><s%> mourn <S%H56><s%>, and every one that dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> therein shall languish <S%H535><s%>, with the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> and the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; yea <S%H1709><s%>, the fishes of the sea <S%H3220><s%> also shall be taken away <S%H622><s%>.

Yet let no man <S%H376><s%> strive <S%H7378><s%>, neither let any man reprove <S%H3198><s%>; <S%H376><s%> for thy people <S%H5971><s%> are as they that strive <S%H7378><s%> with the priest <S%H3548><s%>.

And thou shalt stumble <S%H3782><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%>, and the prophet <S%H5030><s%> also shall stumble <S%H3782><s%> with thee in the night <S%H3915><s%>; and I will destroy <S%H1820><s%> thy mother <S%H517><s%>.

My people <S%H5971><s%> are destroyed <S%H1820><s%> for lack of knowledge <S%H1847><s%>: because thou hast rejected <S%H3988><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>, I will also reject <S%H3988><s%> thee <S%H3547><s%>, that thou shalt be no priest to me <S%H7911><s%>: seeing thou hast forgotten the law <S%H8451><s%> of thy God <S%H430><s%>, I also will forget <S%H7911><s%> thy children <S%H1121><s%>.
As they were multiplied <S%H7230><s%>, so they sinned <S%H2398><s%> against me <S%H4171><s%>: I will change their glory <S%H3519><s%> into shame <S%H7036><s%>.
They feed <S%H398><s%> on the sin <S%H2403><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, and set <S%H5375><s%> their heart <S%H5315><s%> on their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H5971><s%>, like people, like priest <S%H3548><s%>; and I will punish <S%H6485><s%> them for their ways <S%H1870><s%>, and will requite <S%H7725><s%> them their doings <S%H4611><s%>.

And they shall eat <S%H398><s%>, and not have enough <S%H7646><s%>; they shall play the harlot <S%H2181><s%>, and shall not increase <S%H6555><s%>; because they have left off <S%H5800><s%> taking heed <S%H8104><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Whoredom <S%H2184><s%> and wine <S%H3196><s%> and new wine <S%H8492><s%> take away <S%H3947><s%> the understanding <S%H3820><s%>.

My people <S%H5971><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> counsel at their stock <S%H6086><s%>, and their staff <S%H4731><s%> declareth <S%H5046><s%> unto them <S%H7307><s%>; for the spirit of whoredom <S%H2183><s%> hath caused them to err <S%H8582><s%>, and they have played the harlot <S%H2181><s%>, departing from under their God <S%H430><s%>.

They sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> upon the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and burn incense <S%H6999><s%> upon the hills <S%H1389><s%>, under oaks <S%H437><s%> and poplars <S%H3839><s%> and terebinths <S%H424><s%>, because the shadow <S%H6738><s%> thereof is good <S%H2896><s%>: therefore your daughters <S%H1323><s%> play the harlot <S%H2181><s%>, and your brides <S%H3618><s%> commit adultery <S%H5003><s%>.

I will not punish <S%H6485><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> when they play the harlot <S%H2181><s%>, nor your brides <S%H3618><s%> when they commit adultery <S%H5003><s%>; for the men themselves go apart <S%H6504><s%> with harlots <S%H2181><s%>, and they sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> with the prostitutes <S%H6948><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> that doth not understand <S%H995><s%> shall be overthrown <S%H3832><s%>.

Though thou <S%H3478><s%>, Israel, play the harlot <S%H2181><s%>, yet let not Judah <S%H3063><s%> offend <S%H816><s%>; and come <S%H935><s%> not ye unto Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, neither go ye up <S%H5927><s%> to Beth-aven <S%H1007><s%>, nor swear <S%H7650><s%>, As Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>.

For Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath behaved himself stubbornly <S%H5637><s%>, like a stubborn <S%H5637><s%> heifer <S%H6510><s%>: now will Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> them as a lamb <S%H3532><s%> in a large place <S%H4800><s%>.
Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is joined <S%H2266><s%> to idols <S%H6091><s%>; let him alone <S%H3240><s%>.

Their drink <S%H5435><s%> is become sour <S%H5493><s%>; they play the harlot <S%H2181><s%> continually <S%H2181><s%>; her rulers <S%H4043><s%> dearly <S%H3051><s%> love <S%H157><s%> shame <S%H7036><s%>.
The wind <S%H7307><s%> hath wrapped her up <S%H6887><s%> in its wings <S%H3671><s%>; and they shall be put to shame <S%H954><s%> because of their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>.
